title: Is there an evaluation version for the Design Pattern Framework?
ques:
Hello,

We are very interested in your product and we intend to start designing out software using Design Patterns.
We are planning to buy the Design Pattern Framework, but we would like to know if there is an evaluation version available, 
so we can better assess what we can use...

Thank you very much,
Kind regards,


Robert van Drie
Senior Software Engineer

answers.ans:
Hello Robert: 

The Design Pattern Framework comes with 100% source code, which is why we cannot offer an evaluation version.  
However, we do offer a full 60-day money back guarantee, so there is really no risk.  

Dan

Robert, the price for the DoFactory Framework is more than worthy for what you get. 

Buy one single license first and then take a look, I've been using it for many years and it helped me a lot. It is great for learning as well as useful for ideas and solutions for real world problems and projects.
